extension_not_supported_error.message: The Securden server installation you are running does not support this version of the browser extension. Contact support@securden.com for assistance.

rdp_windows_only_error.message: RDP can be triggered from windows machines only.

sql_connection_windows_only_error.message: SQL Server connection can be triggered from windows machines only.

in_exclusive_use_msg.message: In exclusive use by another user

select_computer_to_launch_connection.message: Select the computer/asset to which you wish to launch a remote connection using this account.

asset_associate_with_domain_account.message: If you don't see the computer/asset you want to connect to in the drop-down, it has to be added as an asset associated with this domain account.

select_folder_add_account.message: You should select a folder while adding an account.

select_folder_edit_account.message: You should choose a folder for editing this account.

select_folder_edit_account_no_folder.message: You should select a folder while editing an account. Folders have not yet been created.

select_folder_add_account_no_folder.message: You should select a folder while adding an account. Folders have not yet been created.

select_folder_edit_account_no_folder_per.message: You should select a folder while editing an account. Folders have not yet been created.

select_folder_add_account_no_folder_perm.message: You should select a folder while adding an account. Folders have not yet been created. Contact your administrator to create a folder first.

permanently_delete_account.message: This will permanently delete the account from Securden.

old_and_new_passwords_cannot_be_same.message: New password cannot be the same as the existing one.

enter_password_with_complexity_req.message: Enter a password matching complexity requirements.

you_should_have_logged_in.message: You should have logged in to Securden web-interface to perform this operation through the browser extension.

try_in_securden_extension.message: Please try in Securden browser extension.

no_accounts_found_for_this_site.message: No accounts found for this site

enter_valid_ticket_id.message: To auto-fill credentials, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request.

enter_valid_ticket_id_and_reason.message: To auto-fill credentials, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request and a reason.

enter_a_reason.message: To auto-fill credentials, you need to enter a reason.

autofill_disabled_for_masked_passwords.message: Autofill disabled for accounts shared with 'Open Connection' permission.

checkout_the_password_to_use_it.message: Checkout the password to use it.

request_waiting_for_approval.message: Your request to view the password is waiting for admin approval.

raise_request_and_get_approval.message: You should raise a request to access the password and get admin approval.

does_not_allow_viewing_password.message: Your access permission does not allow viewing the password.

value_length_should_be_less_than.message: The value length should be less than $VALUE_LENGTH$

save_only_as_personal.message: You are about to store this password as 'Personal' account. This account belongs to you and cannot be shared with others. Only you can see such accounts.

save_only_as_work.message: You are about to store this password as 'Work' account. The Securden administrator of your organization has restricted storing personal passwords. Make sure you are adding only work-related passwords. Super administrator of your organization can see all work accounts and passwords.

work_account_help_text.message: 'Work' accounts belong to your organization and hence can be shared with your colleagues on a need basis. Super administrator of your organization can see all work accounts and passwords.

personal_account_help_text.message: 'Personal' accounts belong to you and cannot be shared with others. Only you can see such accounts.

unable_to_connect_to_server_error.message:
Unable to connect to the Securden server

Possible reasons:

  • Server is not reachable
  • Invalid SSL certificate on browser. Please validate the certificate.
  • Invalid URL

save_server_url_help_text.message: This browser extension needs access to the Securden server. Enter the URL you would normally use to access Securden web-interface here

reset_action_old_password_failed.message: Password reset action is triggered by supplying your account's old password. It failed.

password_reset_action_triggered_points.message:
Password reset action is triggered as below:

  • First by supplying your account's old password. It failed.
  • Then by supplying the credentials for remote actions as configured in the application.
    For security reasons, those credentials should have been shared with you for reset to succeed. Since that is not shared with you, password reset action failed.

ticket_id_dialog_help_text.message: To retrieve the password or to automatically login to the website, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request.

reason_dialog_help_text.message: To retrieve the password or to automatically login to the website, you need to enter a reason.

ticket_id_reason_dialog_help_text.message: To retrieve the password or to automatically login to the website, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request and a reason.

ticket_id_dialog_help_text_file.message: To download the file, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request.

reason_dialog_help_text_file.message: To download the file, you need to enter a reason.

ticket_id_reason_dialog_help_text_file.message: To download the file, you need to enter a valid ticket ID corresponding to this request and a reason.

filter_accounts_based_on_url.message: Filter accounts belonging to this IP/URL

view_or_a_higher_permission_is_required.message: View or a higher permission is required to perform this operation.

open_connection_or_higher_permission_req.message: Open connection or higher privilege is required to perform this operation.

minimum_length_invalid.message: Minimum length specified is invalid. It should be greater than the count specified in different complexity rules.

autofill_url_dialog_help_text.message: Select the URL on which you want to autofill username and password for

form_field_help_content.message: Due to certain inherent limitations of web pages, Securden may not be able to identify the login fields for auto-filling credentials on certain websites. Such scenarios can be handled by mapping the input fields on the web pages with the values stored in Securden. You can also configure specific actions (like moving from one field to another) to be performed for submitting the form for pages.

form_field_help_content_2.message: For example, in a webpage, assume there are two fields for username and password, and a submit button. You will have to configure two actions. The first action is Tab for the extension to jump from the password field to the submit button. The second and final action would be a Click so that the login form can be submitted.

refresh_the_page.message: Could not load the input field. Refresh the web page and try again.

scope_help.message: There are two scopes - For Everyone/For Me. You can select 'For Everyone' if you want to configure auto-login for everyone for this webpage. If you select 'For Me' the field mapping configurations will be applicable only for you.

information_lost_on_converting_account_t.message: On converting to a different account type, additional fields in this account will lose the information held in them.

personal_domain_acc_launch_help.message: You can launch remote connections to the permitted resources using the AD account with which you have currently logged in to Securden. The logged-in account name will appear in the text field below.  In addition, if you have any accounts that are classified as 'Personal Domain Account' account type, those account names will also appear in the drop-down.

asset_select_for_personal_domain_account.message: Select the resource you want to access from the drop-down below. If you don't see the IT asset you want to access, contact your administrator (who will add the IT asset and associate it with you).

select_computer_asset.message: Select the computer/asset to be connected.

account_deleted_for_one_day.message: The selected account will be marked as deleted. Navigate to 'Recently Deleted Accounts' section in the folders tree to restore or to permanently delete the account.

account_deleted_permanently.message: The selected account will be permanently deleted. You won't be able to restore.

restore_deleted_account.message: The selected account will be restored to their original state.

fields_captured_succesfully.message: Fields captured succesfully. Open Securden Browser extension to proceed

input_format_doesnt_match.message: The input format does not match.
